name: BEARS.BEETS.the office trivia
description:
Fact. Cafe Nostalgica is the best place you can spend your Monday night. Scranton will be taking over Ottawa so take a break from being The World's Best Boss, your classes at art school, or beet farming to prove you know the most about the Dunder Mifflin family. I can guarantee that you'll leave satisfied and smiling...that's what she said!

Get ready for a night full of trivia from all the seasons and an ample amount of that's what she said jokes (yeah, it might be a good idea to leave your HR friends at home). Reserve your spot by signing up as a team (of 1-4, $20 per team). The top team will get to take home a Dundie (other prizes will also be available)!

Think you've got what it takes to run Dunder Mifflin Scranton? Or will you settle for Assistant to the Regional Manager? Come join us October 5th, 2017 at Cafe Nostalgica to find out!

For questions or concerns, please email any of the following:
Heemel Saha - chair@ieeeuottawa.ca


**
FR:
Cafe Nostalgica est le meilleur endroit o√π vous pouvez passer votre lundi soir. Ottawa se transformera en Scranton pour une soir√©e, alors prenez une pause d'√™tre le meilleur patron du monde, des cours √† l'√©cole d'art ou de l'√©levage de betteraves pour prouver que vous en connaissez le plus √† propos de la famille Dunder Mifflin. Je peux vous garantir que vous quitterez satisfait et souriant ... "that's what she said!"

Pr√©parez-vous pour une soir√©e avec des questions venant de toutes les saisons et plusieurs blagues "that's what she said" (√ßa pourrait √™tre une bonne id√©e de laisser vos amis HR √† la maison). R√©servez votre place en vous inscrivant en √©quipe (de 1-4, 20 $ par co√©quipier, lien d'inscription d'√©quipe √† venir). La meilleure √©quipe recevra un Dundee (d'autres prix seront √©galement disponibles)!

Pensez-vous avoir ce qu'il faut pour g√©rez Dunder Mifflin Scranton? Ou bien serrez vous satisfait avec le poste d'assistant du directeur r√©gional? Venez nous rejoindre le 2 octobre 2017 chez Cafe Nostalgica pour en savoir plus!

Pour des questions ou des pr√©occupations, veuillez envoyer un courriel √† l'une des adresses suivantes:
Heemel Saha - chair@ieeeuottawa.ca

name: EngiBEERing: Wing Night Edition
description:
35 CENT WINGS, $3 BURGERS, $2 FRENCH FRIES, $5 POUTINE UNTIL MIDNIGHT!

What's better than drinking away all of your back to school sorrows? Nothing. Come get a beer (or 20) with us and have a good time! The best thing about Patty's is that they have a clubbing section upstairs (pub/bar section is on the main floor). Whether you're excited or stressed for school, you deserve a drink to celebrate the start of a new semester. All students regardless of faculty are welcome.

This is a 19+ event.

Please direct all questions to Heemel Saha: chair@ieeeuottawa.ca
FR:
AILES POUR 35¬¢, 3 $ BURGERS, 2 $ FRITES FRAN√áAIS, 5 $ POUTINE JUSQU'√Ä MINUIT! 
 
 Quoi de mieux que de boire tous vos chagrins de retour √† l'√©cole? Rien. Venez prendre une bi√®re (ou 20) avec nous et passez un bon moment ! La meilleure chose √† propos de Patty's est qu'ils ont une section clubbing √† l'√©tage (la section pub / bar est au rez-de-chauss√©e). Que vous soyez excit√© ou stress√© pour l'√©cole, vous m√©ritez un verre pour c√©l√©brer le d√©but d'un nouveau semestre. les √©tudiants, quelle que soit leur facult√©, sont les bienvenus. 
 
C'est un √©v√©nement de 19 ans et plus.

name: Google at University of Ottawa
description:
Google is coming to the University of Ottawa on September 24 and 25 to host multiple events over the span of the two days! There will be office hours, a resume/interview workshop, and a coding workshop. All of these events are for you to learn more about life at Google and specific job/internship opportunities Google has for students. There will be food and swag while they last! See the poster for more details and be sure to register as some events have limited capacity:
http://bit.ly/2AOIVoD

Google sera pr√©sent √† l'Universit√© d'Ottawa le 24 et 25 septembre pour organiser plusieurs √©v√©nements int√©ressants destin√©s aux √©tudiants! Au cours de ces deux jours, il y aura un atelier sur les CVs, un atelier de programmation, et des heures de bureau pendant lesquels vous pouvez bavarder avec des employ√©s de Google. Tous ces √©v√©nements sont organis√©s pour vous aider √† vous renseigner sur les opportunit√©s professionnelles offertes aux √©tudiant(e)s par Google, ainsi que la culture professionnelle de Google. Il y aura des rafra√Æchissements et des cadeaux (tant que disponibles)! Pour vous renseigner davantage, veuiller consulter l'affiche ci-jointe. Assurez-vous de vous y inscrire d'avance, car certains √©v√©nements ont une capacit√© limit√©e: http://bit.ly/2AOIVoD

name: IEEE Day 2018!
description:
FREE PIZZA!*
Did we get your attention? Great! IEEE Day is fast approaching and we will be commemorating this anniversary of the first time IEEE members gathered to share their technical ideas in 1884 the way they would've wanted, FREE PIZZA!*

Come hang out with us in the IEEE office on Tuesday October 2nd in STE 4026 to learn more about IEEE and the benefits getting a membership can have!

*while quantities last
FR:
PIZZA GRATUITE! *
Avons-nous attir√© votre attention? G√©nial! La Journ√©e IEEE approche √† grands pas et nous comm√©morerons cet anniversaire de la premi√®re fois que les membres de l'IEEE se sont r√©unis pour partager leurs id√©es techniques en 1884 comme ils l'auraient souhait√©, PIZZA GRATUITE ! * 
 
Venez tra√Æner avec nous dans le bureau de l'IEEE le mardi 2 octobre √† STE 4026 pour en savoir plus sur l'IEEE et les avantages de l'adh√©sion peuvent avoir! 
 
 * jusqu'√† √©puisement des stocks

name: IEEE AGM 2018 (continued)
description:
The IEEE uOttawa Student Branch will be continuing our Annual General Meeting to discuss by-elections and constitution changes.

BY-ELECTIONS:
By-elections will be taking place during this AGM for the vacant executive positions of the general election for the 2018-2019 term. These positions will include:

VP Communications

The following executive positions within the IEEE uOttawa Photonics Student Chapter are also vacant, but please note that their eligibility is limited to GRADUATE STUDENTS ONLY, and strong preference is given to candidates with a specialization in Photonics:

Chair, Photonics Student Chapter
Vice-Chair, Photonics Student Chapter

If you are interested in applying for a position on the 2018-2019 Executive Committee, please email chair@ieeeuottawa.ca with your FULL NAME, STUDENT NUMBER, PROGRAM AND YEAR OF STUDY, and state the position you will be running for. The by-elections will be conducted within the AGM by the executive committee.

As for your application, you along with the other nominees will be allocated 1-2 minutes during the meeting to give a short speech about yourself and what makes you the best candidate for the position. To prepare for this, I would recommend familiarizing yourself with this role's mandate in the IEEE uOttawa Constitution
(http://www.ieeeuottawa.ca/files/constitution1.pdf). Afterwards, the executives may ask you a few questions regarding the role, and then have an internal vote with the execs. Results will be released during the meeting.

__________________________

La Branche √âtudiante de l'IEEE √† uOttawa continuera son Assembl√©e g√©n√©rale annuelle afin de mener des √©lections partielles et d'aborder des changements propos√©es √† sa Constitution.

√âLECTIONS PARTIELLES:

V.-P. Communications

De plus, les deux postes de la Branche √âtudiante de la Photonique de IEEE uOttawa sont √©galement vides. Cependant, veuillez noter que SEULEMENT LES √âTUDIANT(E)S DIPL√îM√â(E)S peuvent postuler pour ces postes, et qu'une forte pr√©f√©rence sera donn√©e aux √©tudiant(e)s dipl√¥m√©(e)s avec une sp√©cialisation en photonique:

Pr√©sident(e), Branche √âtudiante de la Photonique
Vice-Pr√©sident(e), Branche √âtudiante de la Photonique

Si vous souhaitez postuler pour un poste sur le comit√© ex√©cutif 2018-2019, veuillez envoyer un courriel √† chair@ieeeuottawa.ca avec votre NOM AU COMPLET, NUM√âRO √âTUDIANT, PROGRAMME D'√âTUDES et ANN√âE D'√âTUDES, et indiquer le r√¥le pour lequel vous postulez. Les √©lections partielles seront men√©s par le comit√© lors de la r√©union.

En ce qui concerne votre candidature, vous ainsi que les autre candidat(e)s seront allou√©es 1 √† 2 minutes durant la r√©union pour faire un bref discours pendant lequel vous pouvez parler de vous-m√™me et pourquoi vois √™tes le/la meilleur(e) candidat(e) pour le poste. Pour vous pr√©parer, il est recommand√© que vous vous familiarisez avec le mandat du poste en consultant la Constitution de la Branche (http://www.ieeeuottawa.ca/files/constitution1.pdf). Par apr√®s, le comit√© vous demandera quelques questions par rapport au r√¥le, et m√®nera un vote interne. Les r√©sultats du vote seront d√©voil√©s pendant la r√©union.

name: IEEE WIE: Women in Tech Panel
description:
IEEE's WIE is excited to host its first annual Women in Tech panel and is welcomed to ALL students! This is an opportunity to hear some of the most inspiring and accomplished women speak about their experiences and their journey to success along with some great career advice to students! On top of that, you'll get to build meaningful connections with the panelists and other industry professionals who are all very excited to meet the students!

THE EVENT IS FREE AND FREE FOOD WILL BE PROVIDED (After all, we are all students who love free food)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

De plus, c'est un √©v√®nement parfait pour d√©velopper des connections avec les pan√©listes et autres professionnels dans l'industrie. Nous avons h√¢te de vous avoir et de vous rencontrer.

name: Cracking the Coding Interview - Session #1
description:
If your dream company invited you to their offices for a technical interview RIGHT NOW, would you feel well-prepared?

We invite you to attend "Cracking the Coding Interview" ‚Äî a series of technical interview workshops organized jointly by IEEE uOttawa, CSSA, and SESA, featuring questions from "Cracking the Coding Interview" by Gayle McDowell! üí°üìñ

The workshops will last 1 hour each, during which experienced mentors will explain and solve certain questions from the book, as well as discuss other interview tips! üìã The first session will serve as an introduction, and increasingly difficult problems will be discussed in future sessions.

Don't put it off any longer - join us Friday, November 9th at 7PM in CBY B012 for our intro session, and get ready to learn!

Session 1 : Friday, November 9th, 7PM

Session 2: Friday, November 16th, 7PM

Session 3: Friday, November 23rd, 7PM

_______________________________

Les ateliers seront d‚Äôune dur√©e d‚Äôune heure chaque; pendant ce temps, des mentors exp√©riment√©s r√©soudront et vous expliqueront des questions techniques tir√©es du livre. Les mentors discuteront √©galement de conseils pour des entrevues ! üìã La premi√®re s√©ance servira d'introduction, et des questions de plus en plus difficiles seront abord√©es lors des futures s√©ances.

N‚Äôattendez pas ‚Äì rejoignez-nous lors de notre s√©ance d‚Äôintroduction le vendredi 9 novembre √† 19h au local CBY B012, et soyez pr√™ts √† apprendre !

Deuxi√®me s√©ance : le vendredi 16 novembre, 19h

Troisi√®me s√©ance : le vendredi 23 novembre, 19h

name: 3rd IEEE Coding Challenge
description:
The IEEE Coding Challenge is back for another semester!

Come out to SITE 2060 on Tuesday, Nov. 20th for a one-hour coding challenge.

You must sign up for the challenge using this link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSckHUd8NJorRMhbgu-isZ3rwxyeYqy6OO5Q4mzvBFtvM0c3Gg/viewform?usp=sf_link

There will be prizes and fooooood!!

Rules:
- Participants must work individually.
- Participants will have exactly 1 hour to complete the challenge.
- The coding challenge will begin at 7:15pm sharp.
- You may use any programming language.

Solutions will be judged based on algorithm efficiency and the time it takes to complete the challenge.

Participants will have the chance to discuss the solutions after the challenge and are encouraged to stick around to explain their approach.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
D√©fi de programmation de l‚ÄôIEEE : √©dition automne 2018!

Il y aura de la nourriture et des prix!!!

-Les participants doivent travailler de fa√ßon individuelle
-‚ÄéLe d√©fi aura une dur√©e d‚Äôexactement une heure
-‚ÄéLe d√©fi commencera √† exactement 19h15
-‚ÄéEn ce qui concerne le langage de programmation utilis√©, les participants auront le choix libre

Les crit√®res d‚Äô√©valuation pour les solutions prendront en compte principalement l'efficacit√© de l'algorithme et le temps requis pour r√©soudre le d√©fi.

Apr√®s le d√©fi, les participants auront l'opportunit√© de discuter de leurs solutions, et sont encourag√©(e)s d‚Äôexpliquer leur m√©thode utilis√©e pour r√©soudre le d√©fi.

name: Big Eng Little Eng Kickoff!
description:
Start your eng(ines) and accelerate your academic career by meeting innovative engineering students and professionals!

This is the first official event for IEEE uOttawa WIE's Big Eng Little Eng (BELE) Mentorship Program - EVERYONE is welcome to attend this casual networking event (mentorship applications not required to attend).

If you are interested in signing up for BELE Mentorship (all students welcome):
https://goo.gl/forms/PKNEvICdl9TUwzW92

Don't know what BELE is? Fear not! You've come to the right place. BELE is a mentorship program for first year studunts to get adjusted to life at university. All first years get paired up with an upper year (ideally in the same discipline) so they've got someone to help guide them through the craziness that is first year engineering.

Come hang out and play some board games and enjoy some hot chocolate after the craziness of midterm season!
-----------
Commencez votre eng (Ines) et acc√©l√©rez votre carri√®re acad√©mique en rencontrant des √©tudiants et des professionnels innovants en ing√©nierie !

C'est le premier √©v√©nement officiel pour le programme de mentorat de l'ieee uottawa wie (bele). Tout le monde est le bienvenu pour assister √† cet √©v√©nement de r√©seautage occasionnel (les demandes de mentorat ne sont pas tenues d'y assister).

Si vous √™tes int√©ress√© (e) √† vous inscrire pour bele mentorat (tous les √©tudiants bienvenus) :
https://goo.gl/forms/PKNEvICdl9TUwzW92

Tu ne sais pas ce que c'est ? Ne craignez rien ! Vous √™tes au bon endroit. Bele est un programme de mentorat pour la premi√®re ann√©e studunts pour s'adapter √† la vie √† L'Universit√©. Toutes les premi√®res ann√©es s'allient avec une ann√©e sup√©rieure (id√©alement dans la m√™me discipline) donc ils ont quelqu'un pour aider √† les guider √† travers la folie qui est l'ing√©nierie de premi√®re ann√©e.

Venez tra√Æner et jouer √† des jeux de soci√©t√© et profiter du chocolat chaud apr√®s la folie de la saison √† mi-parcours !
FR: Commencez votre eng (Ines) et acc√©l√©rez votre carri√®re acad√©mique en rencontrant des √©tudiants et des professionnels innovants en ing√©nierie !

name: Cracking the Coding Interview - Session #2
description:
We hope you enjoyed the intro session of Cracking the Coding Interview last week! Join us this friday for session #2, where we will go over some data structures and coding questions that involve them!

If you haven't already joined the Facebook discussion group for Cracking the Coding Interview, you can find it here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/569650000139322/?ref=br_rs

______________________________

If your dream company invited you to their offices for a technical interview RIGHT NOW, would you feel well-prepared?

We invite you to attend "Cracking the Coding Interview" ‚Äî a series of technical interview workshops organized jointly by IEEE uOttawa, CSSA, and SESA, featuring questions from "Cracking the Coding Interview" by Gayle McDowell! üí°üìñ

name: Cracking the Coding Interview - Session #3
description:
We hope you enjoyed Cracking the Coding Interview last week! For those of you who weren't able to join us for session #2, a livestream is available in the group below.

Join us this Friday for session #3, the LAST Fall 2018 session! We will be going over some data structures often relevant in interview questions - hash maps and linked-lists (among others) before moving on to some practice problems. This event is open to students of all skill levels, whether you're experienced with these concepts or not!

If you haven't already joined the Facebook discussion group for Cracking the Coding Interview, you can find it here.
Feel free to ask questions in this group! https://www.facebook.com/groups/569650000139322/?ref=br_rs

description: Come learn more about Agile with Sairam Ramadass. Sairam Ramadass has been working in the IT industry for the last 23 years. Since 2018 Sairam is consulting at ESDC as a senior Agile and DevOps coach and trainer.

name: Big Eng, Little Eng
description:
EVERYONE is welcome to attend this event (mentorship applications not required to attend). If you are interested in signing up for Big Eng Little Eng Mentorship (all students welcome): https://forms.gle/NomAoGHnossk8LZC7 

Don't know what Big Eng Little Eng is? Fear not! You've come to the right place. BELE is a mentorship program for first-year students to get adjusted to life at university. All first years get paired up with an upper year (ideally in the same discipline) so they've got someone to help guide them through the craziness that is first-year engineering. Big eng, Little eng also prepares you with a list of online tools and tips that students only discover after a year at uni!
